ui.notes: Integrated SettingsModal, metadata preferences, and global loader while targeting /api/pdf_tools/* endpoints.
Consumes /api/hydride_segmentation/segment, exposes per-tool settings, and removes reliance on server props.
Loads families via /api/unit_converter/families, adds persistent preferences, and standardises conversions.
Provides shared Recharts wrapper for scatter/line/bar data using the unified JSON contract.
Global loading indicator driven by LoadingContext; accessible focus management.
Reusable modal for per-tool preferences with keyboard focus trap and ARIA wiring.
Ported to React SPA hooks with chart visualisations, per-tool settings, and unified /api/tabular_ml endpoints.
